meta.job_title: Senior Director, Climate & Clean Energy Programs

duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and maintain a strong understanding of climate and clean energy policy actions, political dynamics, and stakeholder positions in priority states.
Build relationships of trust with policymakers, partners, and stakeholders.
Identify and build opportunities for meaningful policies, programs, and initiatives to reduce greenhouse gas emissions, promote economic prosperity, and advance environmental justice.
Develop written materials, talking points, white papers, online articles, and other messaging documents.
Collaborate on fundraising activities, draft grant reports, and track grant activities.
Plan and execute special projects and events.
Supervise programmatic team members, maintain program priorities, update implementation strategies, and guide strategic shifts and new opportunities.
Contribute to a caring, respectful, inclusive, and professional work environment for colleagues and everyone the organization works with.

education_certification.credential: JD degree is helpful but other advanced degrees will be given equal consideration
